entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
